entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
